text: Evangelia Sotiriou (, born March 2, 1980, Athens) is a Greek rhythmic gymnast. Sotiriou competed for Greece in the rhythmic gymnastics individual all-around competition at the 1996 Summer Olympics in Atlanta. There, she was 26th in the qualification round and didn't advance to the semifinal. == References == == External links == * * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Greek rhythmic gymnasts Category:Gymnasts at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gymnasts of Greece Category:Sportspeople from Athens
title: Evangelia Sotiriou
